com.oracle.interview.db

Interface ActivityRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityRepositoryImpl

    public interface ActivityRepository
    The storage APIs for manipulate the activities list

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Activity addActivity(Activity activity)
      Add a new Activity in the storage
      Optional<Activity> editActivity(Activity activity)
      Modify the Activity with the same id as Activity.getId().
      Optional<List<Activity>> getActivities(User user)
      Returns the list of the activities stored
      Optional<Activity> getActivityById(String id)
      Returns the Activity with the same id.
      int removeAll()
      Remove all stored activities
      Optional<Activity> removeById(String id)
      Remove activity with the id

    • Method Detail

      • addActivity

        Activity addActivity(Activity activity)
        Add a new Activity in the storage
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity to be added
        Returns:
        the activity stored into the data source. The attribute Activity.getId() should be unique in the datasource

      • getActivities

        Optional<List<Activity>> getActivities(User user)
        Returns the list of the activities stored
        Parameters:
        user - The User that is logged into the system or a guest
        Returns:
        the list of the activities stored
        See Also:
        SimpleDatabaseAuthenticator

      • getActivityById

        Optional<Activity> getActivityById(String id)
        Returns the Activity with the same id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the activity that you are looking for.
        Returns:
        the Activity with the id, null otherwise.

      • editActivity

        Optional<Activity> editActivity(Activity activity)
        Modify the Activity with the same id as Activity.getId().
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity to store.
        Returns:
        the Activity with the id, null if the existing activity doesn't exist.

      • removeAll

        int removeAll()
        Remove all stored activities
        Returns:
        the dropped number of activities

      • removeById

        Optional<Activity> removeById(String id)
        Remove activity with the id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Activity that should be dropped
        Returns:
        the dropped Activity
